GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.29 to before v5.10.104
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_queue: fix possible use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.104 by commit 4d05239203fa38ea8a6f31e228460da4cb17a71a, it was introduced in version v2.6.29 by commit 271b72c7fa82c2c7a795bc16896149933110672d. For more details please see the references link.
